[The Summer of Love](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Summer_of_Love)

-The so called 'Summer of Love' took place in the summer of 1967 in the Haight-Ashbury neighborhood of San Francisco
-Thousands of young people migrated to the neighborhood
-By the end of the summer problems of disease and youth homelessness ran rampant
-On the upside, a lot of great music was made
